ID="contian" Class="content-padding" Options="region:'center',title:'工作经历'"> <Controls> <GridView ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="EjbID"> <Columns> <Column Title="员工" FieldName="Name" /> <Column Title="起始日期" FieldName="StartDate" HAlignment="Center" /> <Column Title="结束日期" FieldName="EndDate" HAlignment="Center" /> <Column Title="公司名称" FieldName="CompanyName" /> <Column Title="部门名称" FieldName="DepartmentName" /> <Column Title="职位" FieldName="Position" /> <Column Title="直属主管" FieldName="ManagerName" /> <Column Title="联系电话" FieldName="ManagerPhone" /> <Column Title="离职原因" FieldName="LeaveReson" /> </Columns> </GridView> </Controls> </StackPanel> </Controls> </Form> </FormViewActionCommand>

Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="编辑结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_EmployeeJob" CommandName="Update"> <Parameter Name="CompanyName" Path="Request[CompanyName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="DepartmentName" Path="Request[DepartmentName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="StartDate" Path="Request[StartDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="EndDate" Path="Request[EndDate]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ManagerName" Path="Request[ManagerName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ManagerPhone" Path="Request[ManagerPhone]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="LeaveReson" Path="Request[LeaveReson]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="EjbID" Path="Request[EjbID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="EmployeeID" Path="Request[EmployeeID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Position" Path="Request[Position]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行更新].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行更新].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行更新].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>
